title: Happy Memorial Day, Ask The Crew, Reenactment, Comedy Roulette and more.
itunes:title: Happy Memorial Day, Ask The Crew, Reenactment, Comedy Roulette and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Memorial Day to you and yours. The CEO has some questions for the crew. J. Anthony Brown has another reenactment just for you. Comedy Roulette is back with people that go 0 to 60 in one flat. Do you know someone who changes just a little bit and starts acting completely brand new? The Chief Love Officer has some truth for a bride to be hopeful that stings. Have you ever said something without thought that just turned into a full blown argument? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us what we can control and what to do with it and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
